metadata.name: Worlds of Souls - Art in motion
metadata.description:
This artwork creates an atmosphere surrounding the viewer, revealing images with different intensities in light, sound and artistic forms and shapes balanced together to generate a different experience with art and technology. 
The first "Art in motion" in Latin America to be tokenized and auctioned on the network. This  solidarity project donates a percentage of the artwork sale to the Non-Governmental Organization (NGO) Foundation @todosconEmita, that collects nationwide for low-income children in critical health situations.
The auction content is delivered inside an exclusive designed box, containing a tablet with the Art in Motion video, printed artwork, certificates and a bronze cryptocurrency with the artist logo and QR code to scann opening the main NFT creation. 
See the contents in this link:
https://wax.atomichub.io/explorer/asset/1099554532489 
Acquiring the artwork is experiencing the vision of wholeness in an original, unique and personalized way: “Matarín experience”.
